					### ENV ###

	-- Test[3] --

INPUT=env HOME

	-- RETURN VALUE --
env: ‘HOME’: No such file or directory
---->[OK]

	-- EXIT STATUS --
MINISHELL=127
BASH=127
---->[OK]

	-- VALGRIND --

==353140== Parent PID: 352318
==353140==

==353140==   total heap usage: 398 allocs, 398 frees, 13,172 bytes allocated
==353140==
